content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
EXEC
The
EXEC
command is used to execute a stored procedure.
The following SQL executes a stored procedure named "SelectAllCustomers":
Example
EXEC SelectAllCustomers;

summary: This tutorial covers SQLEXEC Keyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQLEXEC Keyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQLEXEC Keyword and how to apply it in your projects.
